headline: IDEX Corporation Announces Increase to Share Repurchase Authorization and Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., September 18, 2025--IDEX Corp. (NYSE:IEX) announces a share purchase authorization that brings total repurchase capacity to $1 billion.
